channel.title: Blogs on Lucy Taylor
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Lucy Taylor

item.title: Audience growth
item.description: Researched the behaviour of Formula 1 fans on social media, identified patterns and delivered recommendations of how the F1 brand could exploit these insights to grow their audience

item.title: Mental health web chat
item.description: Designed a web chat to provide timely, interactive and easily accessible mental health support from a real person

item.title: Technology guidance
item.description: Designed technology guidance for 24,000+ schools and colleges across the UK, explaining what technology they should be using to maximise the quality of education, and how to get it

item.title: Markdown Syntax
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
